Each party is obliged to treat any data and information not publicly accessible as confidential and to use these exclusively for the purpose intended. 


b.The confidentiality rule does not apply to data and information that must be passed on to third parties, especially public authorities, due to legal obligations. The other party is to be informed about such obligation without delay.
